Name: Simple Sky
About the game: Every star dies... In this roguelike action game, you are the sole survivor of a dead planet. Battle alien hordes as you fight to outlast a dying universe. Gather resources and build a synergistic collection of upgrades and followers to help you avenge your home world and obliterate anything that stands in your way. Fight! Gather an arsenal of weapons and followers to battle a never-ending host of alien oddities. Scavenge! Scour each Solar System to find the richest mineral deposits, and use your army of probes to collect them. Upgrade! Use the minerals you've gathered to enhance your ship. With each run offering a different series of upgrade choices, your best resource will be your ever-expanding knowledge of the opportunities and challenges waiting in the next system.
